mkt_general.mkt_name: Lexmark CX825de
mkt_general.mkt_paragraph: The Lexmark CX825de colour A4 MFP combines a print speed of up to 52 pages per minute, ease of use, professional colour and configurable software solutions, with available finishing options.
mkt_general.tagline: Fast print speed plus enhanced finishing supports high-volume production TEST

feature.feature_text: A 1.6 GHz quad core processor with 2 GB of standard memory helps the CX825 Series handle complex jobs, while print speed of up to 52 ppm allows users in high-volume print environments to get fast colour output. Even large colour print jobs complete quickly so users are more productive.
Professional colour features include ultra-sharp 4800 Colour Quality, PANTONE® calibration and spot colour replacement for repeatable colour accuracy even with critical corporate identity elements.

Lexmark-exclusive Embedded Solutions Framework (eSF) makes the MFP programmable to meet the needs of each customer and industry. And the CX825 Series’ 25-cm (10-inch) class e-Task colour touchscreen features an ultra-smooth surface that can be activated by almost anything, including pens, fingertips or nails – without pressure or direct skin contact.

It starts with standard input capacity of up to 650 pages (expandable to 4,500) and prints on the broadest media weight range of any A4 colour laser MFP – from tissue-thin paper to thick card stock. Add a compact inline staple finisher or multi-position staple/hole punch finisher.

It starts with 1,200 dpi CCD-based scan quality for colour and information accuracy, then adds automatic size sensing and ultrasonic multifeed detection to ensure that every page intended for archiving or integration into your digital workflow is successfully scanned.

Minimising maintenance reduces downtime, so the CX825 features photoconductor units that last up to 175,000 pages, and replacement toner rated at up to 33,000* black and up to 22,000* colour pages. (* Average continuous black or continuous composite CMY declared cartridge yield up to this number of standard pages in accordance with ISO/IEC 19798.)

description.description_text: The Lexmark CX825de colour A4 MFP combines a print speed of up to 52 pages per minute, ease of use, professional colour and configurable software solutions with available finishing options.

The Lexmark CX825de colour A4 MFP combines a print speed of up to 52 pages per minute, ease of use and professional colour with configurable software solutions. Its high-performance graphics chip, standard input capacity of up to 650 pages (expandable to 4,500) and monthly duty cycle of up to 250,000 pages are enhanced by advanced staple and staple/hole punch finishing options.

The Lexmark CX825de colour A4 MFP combines a 52 page-per-minute print speed, ease of use and professional colour with configurable software solutions. A 25-cm (10-inch) class e-Task colour touchscreen features an ultra-smooth surface that can be activated by almost anything, including pens, fingertips or nails –without pressure or direct skin contact. Its high-performance graphics chip, standard input capacity of up to 650 pages (expandable to 4,500) and monthly duty cycle of up to 250,000 pages are enhanced by optional finishing capabilities comparable to production A3 copiers: inline staple finisher and multi-position staple/hole punch finisher. To reduce maintenance and minimise downtime, it has long-life photoconductor units and high-yield toner cartridges – ideal for high-volume production environments.

mkt_general.mkt_name: Lexmark CS720dte
mkt_general.mkt_paragraph: The Lexmark CS720dte offers workgroup-level printing performance in a simple, feature-rich package that’s easy to use and comes with extra input capacity.
mkt_general.tagline: Workgroup-level colour printing in a simple, feature-rich package

feature.feature_text: A 1.2 GHz quad core processor with up to 3 GB of memory gives the CS720 a powerful print controller.
Professional colour features like ultra-sharp 4800 Colour Quality, PANTONE® calibration and Lexmark Colour Replacement work with Unison Toner to deliver precision matching of critical hues.
Lexmark-exclusive Cloud Solution Framework (cSF) and Embedded Solutions Framework (eSF) applications make the printer programmable to meet the needs of each customer and industry.

Media loading and feeding are engineered for ease, reliability and versatility, with up to 1200 pages of standard input capacity (expandable to 2,300), small-media and banner-length support, and exceptionally durable input trays that resist misfeeds.

A bright, 10.9-cm (4.3-inch) colour touch screen features an ultra-smooth surface and can be activated by almost anything, including pens, fingertips or nails –without pressure or direct skin contact.

Essential to Lexmark print system performance, Unison™ Toner's unique formulation consistently delivers outstanding image quality, ensures long-life print system reliability and promotes superior sustainability -- all in an innovative shake-free print system.

description.description_text: The Lexmark CS720dte offers workgroup-level printing performance in a simple, feature-rich package that’s easy to use and comes with extra input capacity.

Combining the capabilities and durability of a workgroup printer with the ease of use of a personal output device, the Lexmark CS720dte features superb print quality, enterprise-level security, extra input capacity and integration into Lexmark’s smart MFP ecosystem, all in a simple, compact, feature-rich package.

Combining the capabilities and durability of a workgroup printer with the ease of use of a personal output device, the Lexmark CS720dte features superb print quality, enterprise-level security, extra input capacity and integration into Lexmark’s smart MFP ecosystem, all in a simple, compact, feature-rich package. With a 1.2 GHz quad core processor, up to 3 GB of memory and instant warm-up fuser, the CS720dte can produce its first black page in as fast as 6 seconds, and first colour page in as little as 6.5 seconds. And the Lexmark CS720dte supports everything you do at up to 38 pages per minute.

"Maximum Monthly Duty Cycle" is defined as the maximum number of pages a device could deliver in a month using a multishift operation. This metric provides a comparison of robustness in relation to other Lexmark printers and MFPs.

mkt_general.mkt_name: Lexmark CS720de
mkt_general.mkt_paragraph: The Lexmark CS720de offers workgroup-level printing performance in a simple, feature-rich package that’s as easy to use as a personal output device.
mkt_general.tagline: Workgroup-level colour printing in a simple, feature-rich package

feature.feature_text: A 1.2 GHz quad core processor with up to 3 GB of memory gives the CS720 a powerful print controller.
Professional colour features like ultra-sharp 4800 Colour Quality, PANTONE® calibration and Lexmark Colour Replacement work with Unison Toner to deliver precision matching of critical hues.
Lexmark-exclusive Cloud Solution Framework (cSF) and Embedded Solutions Framework (eSF) applications make the printer programmable to meet the needs of each customer and industry.

Media loading and feeding are engineered for ease, reliability and versatility, with up to 650 pages of standard input capacity (expandable to 2,300), small-media and banner-length support and exceptionally durable input trays that resist misfeeds.

A bright, 10.9-cm (4.3-inch) colour touch screen features an ultra-smooth surface and can be activated by almost anything, including pens, fingertips or nails –without pressure or direct skin contact.

Essential to Lexmark print system performance, Unison™ Toner's unique formulation consistently delivers outstanding image quality, ensures long-life print system reliability and promotes superior sustainability -- all in an innovative shake-free print system.

description.description_text: The Lexmark CS720de offers workgroup-level printing performance in a simple, feature-rich package that’s as easy to use as a personal output device.

Combining the capabilities and durability of a workgroup printer with the ease of use of a personal output device, the Lexmark CS720de features superb print quality, enterprise-level security and integration into Lexmark’s smart MFP ecosystem, all in a simple, compact, feature-rich package.

Combining the capabilities and durability of a workgroup printer with the ease of use of a personal output device, the Lexmark CS720de features superb print quality, enterprise-level security and integration into Lexmark’s smart MFP ecosystem, all in a simple, compact, feature-rich package. With a 1.2 GHz quad core processor, up to 3 GB of memory and instant warm-up fuser, the CS720de can produce its first black page in as fast as 6 seconds, and first colour page in as little as 6.5 seconds. And the Lexmark CS720de supports everything you do at up to 38 pages per minute.

mkt_general.mkt_paragraph: Consistently outstanding image quality. Long-life system reliability. Superior sustainability. Innovative shake-free print system.
mkt_general.tagline: Essential to Lexmark Print System Performance.

feature.feature_text: Essential to Lexmark print system performance, Unison™ Toner's unique formulation consistently delivers outstanding image quality, ensures long-life print system reliability and promotes superior sustainability -- all in an innovative shake-free print system.

Maximise your savings and enjoy premium quality with Genuine Lexmark cartridges. High Yield cartridges offer a lower cost per page and contain more pages than Standard Yield cartridges do. Perfect for high volume printing.
Genuine Lexmark supplies are engineered to work Best Together with your Lexmark printer, delivering excellent print quality from the first page to the last.
Going green has never been easier. Recycle all your used Lexmark supplies by letting us take care of the details. It’s simple, smart and always free.
Lexmark offers customers a broad choice of laser toner cartridges and recycling options including easy return to Lexmark. For superior results, always use Genuine Lexmark supplies.

mkt_general.mkt_name: Lexmark B3340dw
mkt_general.mkt_paragraph: Light, compact and fast, the B3340dw supports output of up to 38 pages per minute*, Wi-Fi and network connectivity, and an optional 550-sheet paper tray.
mkt_general.tagline: Productive, reliable, Wi-Fi-equipped printing

feature.feature_text: Measuring just 222 mm high x 368 mm wide x 366 mm deep, the business-class B3340dw fits almost anywhere. Its compact size and light weight make it easy to set up and easy to move.
Optional High Yield Unison™ toner provides up to 3,000 pages** of output, whilst an optional paper tray increases total input capacity by up to 900 sheets for more printing and less downtime.

Get your first page as fast as 6.2 seconds, and power through challenging jobs with a 1-GHz dual-core processor and 256 MB of memory. Connect via Wi-Fi, USB or Ethernet to give your whole team access.

Lexmark's comprehensive approach to product security is a design and engineering mandate across our entire product portfolio. Our security features help to keep your information safe - in the document, on the device, over the network and at all points in between.
With its steel frame and lifetime fuser, the B3340dw is built to last.

Automatic two-sided printing is standard, along with built-in energy-saving modes that help to support ratings of EPEAT® Silver and ENERGY STAR® certified. The Lexmark Cartridge Collection Programme (LCCP) and Lexmark Equipment Collection Programme (LECP) minimise waste and support recycling (availability varies by country).
* Print and copy speeds measured in accordance with ISO/IEC 24734 and ISO/IEC 24735 respectively (ESAT). For more information see: www.lexmark.com/ISOspeeds.

** Average continuous mono declared yield in one-sided (simplex) mode of up to this number of pages in accordance with ISO/IEC 19752. Actual yield will vary considerably based upon many factors. See www.lexmark.com/yields for more information.

description.description_text: Light, compact and fast, the B3340dw supports output of up to 38 pages per minute*, Wi-Fi and network connectivity, and an optional 550-sheet paper tray.

Light, compact and fast, the B3340dw supports output of up to 38 pages per minute*, Wi-Fi and network connectivity, and the option of adding a 550-sheet paper tray for longer print runs. Get your first page as fast as 6.2 seconds, plus Lexmark full-spectrum security to help to protect sensitive information.

With output of up to 38 pages per minute* and a light, compact form factor, the Lexmark B3340dw provides fast, dependable performance in a package that fits almost anywhere. Connect via Wi-Fi, USB or Ethernet and power through big jobs with a 1-GHz multi-core processor, 256 MB of memory and a 100-sheet multipurpose feeder. Optional High Yield Unison™ toner offers up to 3,000 pages of output**, and an optional 550-sheet paper tray supports longer print runs. A steel frame drives durability and long-life reliability, whilst standard two-sided printing saves paper, the lifetime fuser minimises maintenance, and Lexmark full-spectrum security helps to protect your network and proprietary information.

mkt_general.mkt_name: Lexmark CX921de
mkt_general.mkt_paragraph: Loaded with standard features, the 35 ppm, A3 Lexmark CX921de supports demanding workloads through a powerful combination of printing, copying, scanning, faxing and optional finishing.
mkt_general.tagline: Multi-format, multi-talented MFP delivers at 35 ppm

feature.feature_text: Colour output up to SRA3/12x18 makes a big impression, whilst additional paper trays allow A4 printing and a multipurpose feeder that takes small envelopes. Amongst the wide range of media types accepted are card stock, glossy stock, recycled paper, transparencies and labels.
Genuine Lexmark toner cartridges print up to 34,000 mono or colour pages, whilst fusers and developer units both go up to 600,000 pages for impressive uptime.

Duplex automatic document feeder (ADF) holds 100 sheets and supports scanning at up to 160 sides per minute. Support for mixed originals, page-level jam recovery, standard OCR and a “classify and route” option fulfill the highest-speed automated scanning requirements.

The large 10-in. class colour touch screen with next-generation e-Task interface features an ultra-smooth surface and can be activated by almost anything, including pens, fingertips or nails - without pressure or direct skin contact. The modern interface is familiar to users, minimising the need for training.

Enhance your user experience and productivity with the included solution apps, and customise your device via optional apps tailored to your specific need or industry. With available software development kits, you could even create apps of your own. Lexmark smart MFP adaptability future-proofs your investment.
Expand your capabilities with finishing options that include multi-position stapling, hole punch, booklet, saddle stitch and tri-fold. The finisher raises output capacity to 3,500 sheets..

description.description_text: Loaded with standard features, the 35 ppm, A3 Lexmark CX921de supports demanding workloads through a powerful combination of printing, copying, scanning, faxing and optional finishing.

Loaded with standard features, the 35 ppm, multi-format Lexmark CX921de supports demanding workloads through a powerful combination of printing, copying, scanning, faxing and optional finishing. Colour output up to SRA3/12x18 makes a big impression, whilst thoughtful engineering drives endurance and minimises interruptions to keep the work moving.

Loaded with standard features, the 35 ppm, multi-format Lexmark CX921de supports demanding workloads through a powerful combination of printing, copying, scanning, faxing and optional finishing. Colour output up to SRA3/12x18 makes a big impression, whilst thoughtful engineering drives endurance and minimises interruptions to keep the work moving. The CX921de is an ideal choice for medium to large workgroups that need a flexible MFP that can do it all. Yet its larger-format output and integration with the full portfolio of Lexmark-exclusive features and services, also complement the capabilities of existing A4 fleets.

mkt_general.mkt_name: Lexmark CX825dte
mkt_general.mkt_paragraph: The Lexmark CX825dte colour A4 MFP combines a print speed of up to 52 pages per minute, ease of use, professional colour and standard input capacity of up to 1,750 pages with available finishing options.
mkt_general.tagline: Fast print speed plus enhanced finishing supports high-volume production

feature.feature_text: A 1.6 GHz quad core processor with 2 GB of standard memory helps the CX825 Series handle complex jobs, whilst a print speed of up to 52 ppm allows users in high-volume print environments to get fast colour output. Even large colour print jobs complete quickly so users are more productive.
Professional colour features include ultra-sharp 4800 Colour Quality, PANTONE® calibration and spot colour replacement for repeatable colour accuracy even with critical corporate identity elements.

Lexmark-exclusive Embedded Solutions Framework (eSF) makes the MFP programmable to meet the needs of each customer and industry. And the CX825 Series’ 25-cm (10-inch) class e-Task colour touchscreen features an ultra-smooth surface that can be activated by almost anything, including pens, fingertips or nails – without pressure or direct skin contact.

It starts with standard input capacity of up to 1,750 pages (expandable to 4,500) and prints on the broadest media weight range of any A4 colour laser MFP – from tissue-thin paper to thick card stock. Later, add a compact inline staple finisher or multi-position staple/hole punch finisher.

It starts with 1,200 dpi CCD-based scan quality for colour and information accuracy, then adds automatic size sensing and ultrasonic multifeed detection to ensure that every page intended for archiving or integration into your digital workflow is successfully scanned.

Minimising maintenance reduces downtime, so the CX825 features photoconductor units that last up to 175,000 pages, and replacement toner rated at up to 33,000* black and up to 22,000* colour pages. (* Average continuous black or continuous composite CMY declared cartridge yield up to this number of standard pages in accordance with ISO/IEC 19798.)

description.description_text: The Lexmark CX825dte colour A4 MFP combines a print speed of up to 52 pages per minute, ease of use, professional colour and standard input capacity of up to 1,750 pages with available finishing options.

The Lexmark CX825dte colour A4 MFP combines a print speed of up to 52 pages per minute, ease of use and professional colour with configurable software solutions. Its high-performance graphics chip, standard input capacity of up to 1,750 pages (expandable to 4,500) and monthly duty cycle of up to 250,000 pages are enhanced by advanced finishing options for both stapling and hole-punching (optional).

The Lexmark CX825dte colour A4 MFP combines a 52 page-per-minute print speed, ease of use and professional colour with configurable software solutions. A 25-cm (10-inch) class e-Task colour touchscreen features an ultra-smooth surface that can be activated by almost anything, including pens, fingertips or nails –without pressure or direct skin contact. Its high-performance graphics chip, standard input capacity of up to 1,750 pages (expandable to 4,500) and monthly duty cycle of up to 250,000 pages are enhanced by an optional staple finisher or staple / hole punch finisher comparable to production A3 copiers. To reduce maintenance and minimise downtime, it has long-life photoconductor units and high-yield toner cartridges – ideal for high-volume production environments.

mkt_general.mkt_paragraph: The Lexmark CX860dtfe colour A4 MFP combines a print speed of up to 57 pages per minute, ease of use, professional colour and a standard input capacity of up to 1,750 pages, plus an inline staple finisher.
mkt_general.tagline: Fully-featured A4 overachiever challenges colour A3 specs

feature.feature_text: A 1.6 GHz quad core processor with 2 GB of standard memory helps the CX860 Series handle complex jobs, whilst a print speed of up to 57 ppm allows users in high-volume print environments to get fast colour output. Even large colour print jobs complete quickly so users are more productive.
Professional colour features include ultra-sharp 4800 Colour Quality, PANTONE® calibration and spot colour replacement for repeatable colour accuracy even with critical corporate identity elements.

Lexmark-exclusive Embedded Solutions Framework (eSF) makes the MFP programmable to meet the needs of each customer and industry. And the CX860 Series’ 25-cm (10-inch) class e-Task colour touchscreen features an ultra-smooth surface that can be activated by almost anything, including pens, fingertips or nails – without pressure or direct skin contact.

feature.header: Advanced media handling with built-in staple finishing
feature.feature_text: It starts with a standard input capacity of up to 1,750 pages of input capacity (expandable to 4,500), includes a compact inline staple finisher and prints on the broadest media weight range of any A4 colour laser MFP – from tissue-thin paper to thick card stock.
The CX860’s 25-cm (10-inch) eTask with Smart Touch Technology colour touchscreen is very responsive and multi-touch capable with pinch, zoom and flick gestures, much like a tablet.

It starts with 1,200 dpi CCD-based scan quality for colour and information accuracy, then adds automatic size sensing and ultrasonic multifeed detection to ensure that every page intended for archiving or integration into your digital workflow is successfully scanned.

Minimising maintenance reduces downtime, so the CX860 features photoconductor units that last up to 175,000 pages, and replacement toner rated at up to 55,000* black and up to 55,000* colour pages.
*Average continuous black or continuous composite CMY declared cartridge yield in one-sided (simplex) mode up to this number of standard pages in accordance with ISO/IEC 19798.

description.description_text: The Lexmark CX860dtfe colour A4 MFP combines a print speed of up to 57 pages per minute, ease of use, professional colour and standard input capacity of up to 1,750 pages, plus an inline staple finisher.

The Lexmark CX860dtfe colour A4 MFP combines a print speed of up to 57 pages per minute, ease of use and professional colour with configurable software solutions. Its high-performance graphics chip, standard input capacity of up to 1,750 pages (expandable to 4,500) and monthly duty cycle of up to 350,000 pages. are enhanced by an inline staple finisher.

The Lexmark CX860dtfe colour A4 MFP combines a 57 page-per-minute print speed, ease of use and professional colour with configurable software solutions. A 25-cm (10-inch) class eTask colour touchscreen features an ultra-smooth surface that can be activated by almost anything, including pens, fingertips or nails – without pressure or direct skin contact. Its high-performance graphics chip, standard input capacity of up to 1,750 sheets (expandable to 4,500) and monthly duty cycle of up to 350,000 pages, are enhanced by an inline stapler finisher. To reduce maintenance and minimise downtime, it has long-life photoconductor units and high-yield toner cartridges – ideal for high-volume production environments.

"Maximum Monthly Duty Cycle" is defined as the maximum number of pages a device could deliver in a month using a multishift operation. This metric provides a comparison of robustness in relation to other Lexmark printers and MFPs.

mkt_general.mkt_name: Lexmark CX725de
mkt_general.mkt_paragraph: The Lexmark CX725de offers workgroup-level printing performance and advanced scanning capabilities in a feature-rich package that’s as easy to use as a personal output device.
mkt_general.tagline: Workgroup-level MFP offers performance and features of more costly devices

feature.feature_text: A 1.2 GHz quad core processor with up to 4 GB of memory gives the CX725 a powerful print controller.
Professional colour features including ultra-sharp 4800 Colour Quality, PANTONE® calibration and Lexmark Colour Replacement work with Unison Toner to deliver precision matching of critical hues.
Lexmark-exclusive Cloud Solution Framework (cSF) and Embedded Solutions Framework (eSF) applications make the MFP programmable to meet the needs of each customer and industry.

Media loading and feeding are engineered for ease, reliability and versatility, with up to 650 pages of input capacity (expandable to 2,300), small-media and banner-length support and exceptionally durable input trays that resist misfeeds.
A bright, 17.8-cm (7-inch) colour touch screen features an ultra-smooth surface and can be activated by almost anything, including pens, fingertips or nails –without pressure or direct skin contact.
Automatic de-skew, mixed-size scanning, page-level jam recovery and integrated file compression make the CX725 a scanning power tool.

description.description_text: The Lexmark CX725de offers workgroup-level printing performance and advanced scanning capabilities in a feature-rich package that’s as easy to use as a personal output device.

Combining the capabilities and durability of a workgroup MFP with the ease of use of a personal output device, the Lexmark CX725de features superb print and scan quality, enterprise-level security and integration into Lexmark’s smart MFP ecosystem, all in a simple, compact, feature-rich package.

Combining the capabilities and durability of a workgroup MFP with the ease of use of a personal output device, the Lexmark CX725de features superb print quality, enterprise-level security and integration into Lexmark’s smart MFP ecosystem, all in a simple, compact, feature-rich package. With a 1.2 GHz quad core processor, up to 4 GB of memory and instant warm-up fuser, the CX725de can produce its first black page in as fast as 5.5 seconds, and first colour page in as little as 6 seconds. And the Lexmark CX725de supports everything you do at up to 47 pages per minute.

mkt_general.mkt_name: Lexmark CS725dte
mkt_general.mkt_paragraph: Faster printing, heavier workloads and longer service intervals join lower cost per page in the durable, easy-to-use, feature-rich Lexmark CS725de.
mkt_general.tagline: Workgroup-level features with accelerated output

feature.feature_text: A 1.2 GHz quad core processor with up to 3 GB of memory gives the CS725 a powerful print controller.
Professional colour features like ultra-sharp 4800 Colour Quality, PANTONE® calibration and Lexmark Colour Replacement work with Unison Toner for precision matching of critical hues.
Lexmark-exclusive Cloud Solution Framework (cSF) and Embedded Solutions Framework (eSF) applications make the printer programmable to meet the needs of each customer and industry.

Media loading and feeding are engineered for ease, reliability and versatility, with up to 1,200 pages of standard input capacity (expandable to 2,300), small-media and banner-length support and exceptionally durable input trays that resist misfeeds.

A bright, 10.9-cm (4.3-inch) colour touch screen features an ultra-smooth surface and can be activated by almost anything, including pens, fingertips or nails –without pressure or direct skin contact.

Essential to Lexmark print system performance, Unison™ Toner's unique formulation consistently delivers outstanding image quality, ensures long-life print system reliability and promotes superior sustainability -- all in an innovative shake-free print system.

description.description_text: Faster printing, heavier workloads, extra input capacity and longer service intervals join lower cost per page in the durable, easy-to-use, feature-rich Lexmark CS725dte.

Combining the capabilities and durability of a workgroup printer with the ease of use of a personal output device, the Lexmark CS725dte offers faster printing, support for heavier workloads, longer service intervals, extra input capacity and lower cost per page, all with integration into the Lexmark smart MFP ecosystem.

Combining the capabilities and durability of a workgroup printer with the ease of use of a personal output device, the Lexmark CS725dte offers faster printing, support for heavier workloads, longer service intervals, extra input capacity and lower cost per page, all with integration into the Lexmark smart MFP ecosystem. With a 1.2 GHz quad core processor, up to 3 GB of memory and instant warm-up fuser, the CS725dte can produce its first black page in as fast as 5.5 seconds, and first colour page in as little as 6 seconds. And the Lexmark CS725tde supports everything you do at up to 47 pages per minute.

mkt_general.tagline: Essential to Lexmark Print System Performance.

feature.feature_text: Essential to Lexmark print system performance, Unison™ Toner's unique formulation consistently delivers outstanding image quality, ensures long-life print system reliability and promotes superior sustainability -- all in an innovative shake-free print system.

Maximise your savings and enjoy premium quality with Genuine Lexmark cartridges. High Yield cartridges offer a lower cost per page and contain more pages than Standard Yield cartridges do. Perfect for high volume printing.
Genuine Lexmark supplies are engineered to work Best Together with your Lexmark printer, delivering excellent print quality from the first page to the last.
Going green has never been easier. Recycle all your used Lexmark supplies by letting us take care of the details. It’s simple, smart and always free.
Lexmark offers customers a broad choice of laser toner cartridges and recycling options including easy return to Lexmark. For superior results, always use Genuine Lexmark supplies.

mkt_general.mkt_name: Lexmark MC3426adw
mkt_general.mkt_paragraph: Small workgroup colour versatility is easy to deploy and share with the compact, lightweight Lexmark MC3426adw multifunction, offering output at up to 24 ppm*.
mkt_general.tagline: Compact and connected colour MFP

feature.feature_text: Get rich, vibrant colour in seconds with Lexmark’s unique Unison™ toner. And easy-to-change Extra High Yield replacement cartridges provide up to 4,500 pages of output** to give you more printing and less downtime.
Compact and lightweight, the MC3426adw fits almost anywhere. But its steel frame and long-life imaging components mean that it’s also built to last.

In addition to Gigabit Ethernet and USB connectivity, dual-band Wi-Fi makes it fast and easy for mobile users to get output via the Lexmark Mobile Print app, as well as Google Cloud Print, Mopria® and AirPrint technologies. And the Lexmark Mobile Assistant app simplifies wireless configuration.

Take command of printing, copying, faxing and automatic two-sided scanning with a 7.2 cm colour touch screen. It not only supports convenient interaction with essential system functions and task information, it also includes built-in cloud connectors to help you to save scans to and retrieve files from popular cloud services Box, DropBox, Google Drive, and Microsoft OneDrive.

Automatic two-sided printing is standard, along with built-in energy-saving modes that help to support ratings of EPEAT® Silver and ENERGY STAR® certified. The Lexmark Cartridge Collection Programme (LCCP) and Lexmark Equipment Collection Programme (LECP) minimise waste and support recycling (availability varies by country).

Lexmark's comprehensive approach to product security is a design and engineering mandate across our entire product portfolio. Our security features help to keep your information safe - in the document, on the device, over the network and at all points in between.
For added peace of mind, this product includes a 4-year guarantee upon registration.
* Print and copy speeds measured in accordance with ISO/IEC 24734 and ISO/IEC 24735 respectively (ESAT). For more information see: www.lexmark.com/ISOspeeds.

** Average continuous black or continuous composite colour (CMY) declared yield in one-sided (simplex) mode of up to this number of pages in accordance with ISO/IEC 19798. Actual yield will vary considerably based upon many factors. See www.lexmark.com/yields for more information.

description.description_text: Small workgroup colour versatility is easy to deploy and share with the compact, lightweight Lexmark MC3426adw multifunction, offering output at up to 24 ppm*.

Small workgroup colour versatility is easy to deploy and share with the compact, lightweight Lexmark MC3426adw multifunction. It combines printing at up to 24 ppm*, with automatic scanning at up 90 images per minute, plus copying and faxing. Take control with a 7.2 cm touch screen and connect via Wi-Fi and more.

Small workgroup colour versatility is easy to deploy and share with the compact, lightweight Lexmark MC3426adw multifunction. Built for reliability, performance and security, it offers lifetime imaging components, output at up to 24 ppm*, scanning at up to 90 images per minute, and Lexmark’s exclusive full-spectrum security. With replacement Extra High Yield Unison™ toner providing up to 4,500 pages of output**, plus media input expandable up to 751 pages, you can print more and stop less. Connect users via USB, Gigabit Ethernet or Wi-Fi, and take control of a 7.2 cm colour touch screen offering built-in cloud connectors for Box, DropBox, Google Drive and Microsoft OneDrive.

mkt_general.mkt_name: Lexmark CS923de
mkt_general.mkt_paragraph: The Lexmark CS923de delivers high-volume colour printing at up to 55 pages per minute (A4) and multi-format output up to SRA3/12x18 with optional finishing.
mkt_general.tagline: Professional colour printing at 55 ppm, plus larger format output and finishing options

feature.feature_text: Make a big impression with colour output up to SRA3/12x18, handle A4 jobs with ease, and use the multipurpose feeder for everything down to small envelopes. Amongst the wide range of media types accepted are card stock, glossy stock, recycled paper, transparencies and labels.

Get input capacity up to 6,650 sheets with optional trays and up to 3,500 sheets of output with optional finisher, minimising paper handling. Genuine Lexmark toner cartridges print up to 18,500 black or 11,500 colour pages, whilst fusers and developer units go up to 720,000 and 600,000 pages, respectively, for impressive uptime.

Match your most critical colours and present your boldest ideas with a well-stocked colour toolbox that includes PANTONE® calibration, embedded colour sample pages and Lexmark Colour Replacement for easy matching of spot and RGB colours.

The 4.3-in. colour touch screen with next-generation e-Task interface features an ultra-smooth surface and can be activated by almost anything, including pens, fingertips or nails - without pressure or direct skin contact. The modern interface is familiar to users, minimising the need for training.

Enhance your user experience and productivity with included solution apps like “Forms and Favourites,” which lets you locate and print forms from network storage locations or content management applications right from the touch screen.
Expand your capabilities with finishing options that include multi-position stapling, hole punch, booklet, saddle stitch and tri-fold. The finisher raises output capacity to 3,500 sheets.

description.description_text: The Lexmark CS923de delivers high-volume colour printing at up to 55 pages per minute (A4) and multi-format output up to SRA3/12x18 with optional finishing.

The Lexmark CS923de delivers high-volume colour printing at up to 55 pages per minute (A4) and multi-format output up to SRA3/12x18 with optional finishing. Thoughtful engineering drives endurance and minimises interruptions to keep the work moving, from high-capacity replacement toner to long-life fusers and developers.

The Lexmark CS923de delivers high-volume colour printing at up to 55 pages per minute (A4) and multi-format output up to SRA3/12x18 with optional finishing. Thoughtful engineering drives endurance and minimises interruptions to keep the work moving, from high-capacity replacement toner to long-life fusers and developers. Professional colour tools and customisable solution apps complement a 4.3-inch touch screen and full accessibility features to maximise ease of use. Comprehensive connectivity options and integration with the full portfolio of Lexmark-exclusive features and services makes it ideal for standalone duty and complements existing A4 fleets.

mkt_general.mkt_shortname: LXK C342XY0 YEL EHY RP PRT CRTG
mkt_general.mkt_paragraph: Consistently outstanding image quality. Long-life system reliability. Superior sustainability. Innovative shake-free print system.
mkt_general.tagline: Essential to Lexmark Print System Performance.

feature.feature_text: Essential to Lexmark print system performance, Unison™ Toner's unique formulation consistently delivers outstanding image quality, ensures long-life print system reliability and promotes superior sustainability -- all in an innovative shake-free print system.

Maximise your savings and enjoy premium quality with Genuine Lexmark cartridges. High Yield cartridges offer a lower cost per page and contain more pages than Standard Yield cartridges do. Perfect for high volume printing.
Going green has never been easier. Recycle all your used Lexmark supplies by letting us take care of the details. It’s simple, smart and always free.

Lexmark Return Programme cartridges are patented print cartridges sold at a discount in exchange for the customer’s agreement to the licence requirement that the cartridges will be used only once and returned only to Lexmark for remanufacturing or recycling. These patented cartridges are licensed for single use only and will stop working after delivering a fixed amount of ink and/or toner. Ink and/or toner may remain in the cartridge when replacement is required. Replacement cartridges sold without these restrictions are also available.
Genuine Lexmark supplies are engineered to work Best Together with your Lexmark printer, delivering excellent print quality from the first page to the last.

description.description_text: Average Continuous Composite CMY Declared Cartridge Yield in one-sided (simplex) mode up to 4,500 standard pages in accordance with ISO/IEC 19798.

mkt_general.mkt_name: Lexmark CS725de
mkt_general.mkt_paragraph: Faster printing, heavier workloads and longer service intervals join lower cost per page in the durable, easy-to-use, feature-rich Lexmark CS725de.
mkt_general.tagline: Workgroup-level features with accelerated output

feature.feature_text: A 1.2 GHz quad core processor with up to 3 GB of memory gives the CS725 a powerful print controller.
Professional colour features like ultra-sharp 4800 Colour Quality, PANTONE® calibration and Lexmark Colour Replacement work with Unison Toner for precision matching of critical hues.
Lexmark-exclusive Cloud Solution Framework (cSF) and Embedded Solutions Framework (eSF) applications make the printer programmable to meet the needs of each customer and industry.

Media loading and feeding are engineered for ease, reliability and versatility, with up to 650 pages of standard input capacity (expandable to 2,300), small-media and banner-length support, and exceptionally durable input trays that resist misfeeds.

A bright, 10.9-cm (4.3-inch) colour touch screen features an ultra-smooth surface and can be activated by almost anything, including pens, fingertips or nails –without pressure or direct skin contact.

Essential to Lexmark print system performance, Unison™ Toner's unique formulation consistently delivers outstanding image quality, ensures long-life print system reliability and promotes superior sustainability -- all in an innovative shake-free print system.

description.description_text: Faster printing, heavier workloads and longer service intervals join lower cost per page in the durable, easy-to-use, feature-rich Lexmark CS725de.

Combining the capabilities and durability of a workgroup printer with the ease of use of a personal output device, the Lexmark CS725de offers faster printing, support for heavier workloads, longer service intervals and lower cost per page, all with integration into the Lexmark smart MFP ecosystem.

Combining the capabilities and durability of a workgroup printer with the ease of use of a personal output device, the Lexmark CS725de offers faster printing, support for heavier workloads, longer service intervals and lower cost per page, all with integration into the Lexmark smart MFP ecosystem. With a 1.2 GHz quad core processor, up to 3 GB of memory and instant warm-up fuser, the CS725de can produce its first black page in as fast as 5.5 seconds, and first colour page in as little as 6 seconds. And the Lexmark CS725de supports everything you do at up to 47 pages per minute.

mkt_general.mkt_name: Lexmark B3442dw
mkt_general.mkt_paragraph: Light, compact and fast, the B3442dw supports output of up to 40 pages per minute*, wired and wireless connectivity, and an optional 550-sheet paper tray.
mkt_general.tagline: Faster printing and wireless connectivity for small workgroups

feature.feature_text: Measuring just 222 mm high x 368 mm wide x 366 mm deep, the business-class B3442dw fits almost anywhere. Its compact size and light weight make it easy to set up and easy to move.

In addition to a first page as fast as 5.9 seconds and output of up to 38 pages per minute*, optional Extra High Yield Unison™ toner provides up to 6,000 pages** of output. Add an optional paper tray that increases total input capacity by up to 900 sheets for more printing and less downtime.

In addition to Ethernet and USB, built-in Wi-Fi makes it easy for mobile users to get output via the Lexmark Mobile Print app, as well as Mopria®, AirPrint and Google Cloud Print. And the Lexmark Mobile Assistant app simplifies wireless configuration.

Lexmark's comprehensive approach to product security is a design and engineering mandate across our entire product portfolio. Our security features help to keep your information safe - in the document, on the device, over the network and at all points in between.
With its steel frame and lifetime fuser, the B3442dw is built to last.

Automatic two-sided printing is standard, along with built-in energy-saving modes that help to support ratings of EPEAT® Silver and ENERGY STAR® certified. The Lexmark Cartridge Collection Programme (LCCP) and Lexmark Equipment Collection Programme (LECP) minimise waste and support recycling (availability varies by country).
For added peace of mind, this product includes a 4-year guarantee upon registration.
* Print and copy speeds measured in accordance with ISO/IEC 24734 and ISO/IEC 24735 respectively (ESAT). For more information see: www.lexmark.com/ISOspeeds.

** Average continuous mono declared yield in one-sided (simplex) mode of up to this number of pages in accordance with ISO/IEC 19752. Actual yield will vary considerably based upon many factors. See www.lexmark.com/yields for more information.

description.description_text: Light, compact and fast, the B3442dw supports output of up to 40 pages per minute*, wired and wireless connectivity, and an optional 550-sheet paper tray.

Light, compact and fast, the B3442dw supports output of up to 40 pages per minute* with wired and wireless connectivity. Optional Extra High Yield Unison™ toner prints up to 6,000 pages** and an optional 550-sheet tray support longer print runs. A 1-GHz multi-core processor powers through big jobs, whilst Lexmark full-spectrum security helps to protect sensitive information.

With output of up to 40 pages per minute* and a light, compact form factor, the Lexmark B3442dw provides fast, dependable performance in a package that fits almost anywhere. Connect via USB, Ethernet or standard Wi-Fi and power through big jobs with a 1-GHz multi-core processor, 256 MB of memory and a 100-sheet multipurpose feeder. Optional Extra High Yield Unison™ toner prints up to 6,000 pages** and an optional 550-sheet paper tray supports longer print runs. A steel frame drives durability and long-life reliability, whilst standard two-sided printing saves paper, the lifetime fuser minimises maintenance, and Lexmark full-spectrum security helps to protect your network and proprietary information.

mkt_general.mkt_name: Lexmark CX725dhe
mkt_general.mkt_paragraph: The Lexmark CX725dhe offers workgroup-level printing performance, advanced scanning, time-saving OCR capabilities and a hard drive for enhanced functionality in a compact, easy-to-use package.
mkt_general.tagline: Workgroup-level MFP offers performance and features of more costly devices

feature.feature_text: A 1.2 GHz quad core processor with up to 4 GB of memory gives the CX725 a powerful print controller.
Professional colour features including ultra-sharp 4800 Colour Quality, PANTONE® calibration and Lexmark Colour Replacement work with Unison Toner to deliver precision matching of critical hues.
Lexmark-exclusive Cloud Solution Framework (cSF) and Embedded Solutions Framework (eSF) applications make the MFP programmable to meet the needs of each customer and industry.

Media loading and feeding are engineered for ease, reliability and versatility, with up to 650 pages of input capacity (expandable to 2,300), small-media and banner-length support and exceptionally durable input trays that resist misfeeds.
A bright, 17.8-cm (7-inch) colour touch screen features an ultra-smooth surface and can be activated by almost anything, including pens, fingertips or nails –without pressure or direct skin contact.
Automatic de-skew, mixed-size scanning, page-level jam recovery, integrated file compression and OCR make the CX725 a scanning power tool.

description.description_text: The Lexmark CX725dhe offers workgroup-level printing performance, advanced scanning, time-saving OCR capabilities and a hard drive for enhanced functionality in a compact, easy-to-use package.

The Lexmark CX725dhe offers workgroup-level printing performance, advanced scanning, time-saving OCR capabilities and a hard drive for enhanced functionality in a compact, easy-to-use package. A 1.2 GHz quad core processor, up to 4 GB of memory and instant warm-up fuser mean a fast first page and up to 47 pages per minute.

The Lexmark CX725dhe offers workgroup-level printing performance, advanced scanning, time-saving OCR capabilities and a hard drive for enhanced functionality in a compact, easy-to-use package. With a 1.2 GHz quad core processor, up to 4 GB of memory and instant warm-up fuser, the CX725dhe can produce its first black page in as fast as 5.5 seconds, and first colour page in as little as 6 seconds. And the Lexmark CX725dhe supports everything you do at up to 47 pages per minute.

mkt_general.mkt_name: Lexmark CS921de
mkt_general.mkt_paragraph: The Lexmark CS921de delivers high-volume colour printing at up to 35 pages per minute (A4) and multi-format output up to SRA3/12x18 with optional finishing.
mkt_general.tagline: Professional colour printing at 35 ppm, plus larger format output and finishing options

feature.feature_text: Make a big impression with colour output up to SRA3/12x18, handle A4 jobs with ease, and use the multipurpose feeder for everything down to small envelopes. Amongst the wide range of media types accepted are card stock, glossy stock, recycled paper, transparencies and labels.

Get input capacity up to 6,650 sheets with optional trays and up to 3,500 sheets of output with optional finisher, minimising paper handling. Genuine Lexmark toner cartridges print up to 18,500 black or 11,500 colour pages, whilst fusers and developer units both go up to 600,000 pages for impressive uptime.

Match your most critical colours and present your boldest ideas with a well-stocked colour toolbox that includes PANTONE® calibration, embedded colour sample pages and Lexmark Colour Replacement for easy matching of spot and RGB colours.

The 4.3-in. colour touch screen with next-generation e-Task interface features an ultra-smooth surface and can be activated by almost anything, including pens, fingertips or nails - without pressure or direct skin contact. The modern interface is familiar to users, minimising the need for training..

Enhance your user experience and productivity with included solution apps like “Forms and Favourites,” which lets you locate and print forms from network storage locations or content management applications right from the touch screen.
Expand your capabilities with finishing options that include multi-position stapling, hole punch, booklet, saddle stitch and tri-fold. The finisher raises output capacity to 3,500 sheets.

description.description_text: The Lexmark CS921de delivers high-volume colour printing at up to 35 pages per minute (A4) and multi-format output up to SRA3/12x18 with optional finishing.

The Lexmark CS921de delivers high-volume colour printing at up to 35 pages per minute (A4) and multi-format output up to SRA3/12x18 with optional finishing. Thoughtful engineering drives endurance and minimises interruptions to keep the work moving, from high-capacity replacement toner to long-life fusers and developers.

The Lexmark CS921de delivers high-volume colour printing at up to 35 pages per minute (A4/) and multi-format output up to SRA3/12x18 with optional finishing. Thoughtful engineering drives endurance and minimises interruptions to keep the work moving, from high-capacity replacement toner to long-life fusers and developers. Professional colour tools and customisable solution apps complement a 4.3-inch touch screen and full accessibility features to maximise ease of use. Comprehensive connectivity options and integration with the full portfolio of Lexmark-exclusive features and services makes it ideal for standalone duty and complements existing A4 fleets.

mkt_general.mkt_name: Lexmark CX825dtfe
mkt_general.mkt_paragraph: The Lexmark CX825dtfe colour A4 MFP combines a print speed of up to 52 pages per minute, ease of use, professional colour and standard input capacity of up to 1,750 pages, plus an inline staple finisher.
mkt_general.tagline: Fast print speed plus enhanced finishing supports high-volume production

feature.feature_text: A 1.6 GHz quad core processor with 2 GB of standard memory helps the CX825 Series handle complex jobs, whilst a print speed of up to 52 ppm allows users in high-volume print environments to get fast colour output. Even large colour print jobs complete quickly so users are more productive.
Professional colour features include ultra-sharp 4800 Colour Quality, PANTONE® calibration and spot colour replacement for repeatable colour accuracy even with critical corporate identity elements.

Lexmark-exclusive Embedded Solutions Framework (eSF) makes the MFP programmable to meet the needs of each customer and industry. And the CX825 Series’ 25-cm (10-inch) class e-Task colour touchscreen features an ultra-smooth surface that can be activated by almost anything, including pens, fingertips or nails – without pressure or direct skin contact.

feature.header: Advanced media handling with built-in staple finishing
feature.feature_text: It starts with standard input capacity of up to 1,750 pages of input capacity (expandable to 4,500), includes a compact inline staple finisher and prints on the broadest media weight range of any A4 colour laser MFP – from tissue-thin paper to thick card stock.

It starts with 1,200 dpi CCD-based scan quality for colour and information accuracy, then adds automatic size sensing and ultrasonic multifeed detection to ensure that every page intended for archiving or integration into your digital workflow is successfully scanned.

Minimising maintenance reduces downtime, so the CX825 features photoconductor units that last up to 175,000 pages, and replacement toner rated at up to 33,000* black and up to 22,000* colour pages. (* Average continuous black or continuous composite CMY declared cartridge yield up to this number of standard pages in accordance with ISO/IEC 19798.)

description.description_text: The Lexmark CX825dtfe colour A4 MFP combines a print speed of up to 52 pages per minute, ease of use, professional colour and standard input capacity of up to 1,750 pages plus an inline staple finisher.

The Lexmark CX825dtfe colour A4 MFP combines a print speed of up to 52 pages per minute, ease of use and professional colour with configurable software solutions. Its high-performance graphics chip, standard input capacity of up to 1,750 pages (expandable to 4,500) and monthly duty cycle of up to 250,000 pages are enhanced by an inline staple finisher.

The Lexmark CX825dtfe colour A4 MFP combines a 52 page-per-minute print speed, ease of use and professional colour with configurable software solutions. A 25-cm (10-inch) class eTask colour touchscreen features an ultra-smooth surface that can be activated by almost anything, including pens, fingertips or nails – without pressure or direct skin contact. Its high-performance graphics chip, standard input capacity of up to 1,750 sheets (expandable to 4,500) and monthly duty cycle of up to 250,000 pages are enhanced by an inline stapler finisher. To reduce maintenance and minimise downtime, it has long-life photoconductor units and high-yield toner cartridges – ideal for high-volume production environments.

mkt_general.mkt_paragraph: Consistently outstanding image quality. Long-life system reliability. Superior sustainability. Innovative shake-free print system.
mkt_general.tagline: Essential to Lexmark Print System Performance.

feature.feature_text: Essential to Lexmark print system performance, Unison™ Toner's unique formulation consistently delivers outstanding image quality, ensures long-life print system reliability and promotes superior sustainability -- all in an innovative shake-free print system.

Maximise your savings and enjoy premium quality with Genuine Lexmark cartridges. High Yield cartridges offer a lower cost per page and contain more pages than Standard Yield cartridges do. Perfect for high volume printing.
Genuine Lexmark supplies are engineered to work Best Together with your Lexmark printer, delivering excellent print quality from the first page to the last.
Going green has never been easier. Recycle all your used Lexmark supplies by letting us take care of the details. It’s simple, smart and always free.

Lexmark Return Programme cartridges are patented print cartridges sold at a discount in exchange for the customer’s agreement to the licence requirement that the cartridges will be used only once and returned only to Lexmark for remanufacturing or recycling. These patented cartridges are licensed for single use only and will stop working after delivering a fixed amount of ink and/or toner. Ink and/or toner may remain in the cartridge when replacement is required. Replacement cartridges sold without these restrictions are also available.
Genuine Lexmark supplies are engineered to work Best Together with your Lexmark printer, delivering excellent print quality from the first page to the last.

mkt_general.mkt_name: Lexmark CX860de
mkt_general.mkt_paragraph: The Lexmark CX860de colour A4 MFP combines a print speed of up to 57 pages per minute, ease of use, professional colour and configurable software solutions with available finishing options.
mkt_general.tagline: Full-featured A4 overachiever challenges colour A3 specs

feature.feature_text: A 1.6 GHz quad core processor with 2 GB of standard memory helps the CX860 Series handle complex jobs, whilst a print speed of up to 57 ppm allows users in high-volume print environments to get fast colour output. Even large colour print jobs complete quickly so users are more productive.
Professional colour features include ultra-sharp 4800 Colour Quality, PANTONE® calibration and spot colour replacement for repeatable colour accuracy even with critical corporate identity elements.

Lexmark-exclusive Embedded Solutions Framework (eSF) makes the MFP programmable to meet the needs of each customer and industry. And the CX860 Series’ 25-cm (10-inch) class e-Task colour touchscreen features an ultra-smooth surface that can be activated by almost anything, including pens, fingertips or nails – without pressure or direct skin contact.

It starts with standard input capacity of up to 650 pages (expandable to 4,500) and prints on the broadest media weight range of any A4 colour laser MFP – from tissue-thin paper to thick card stock. Add a compact inline staple finisher or multi-position staple/hole punch finisher.
The CX860’s 25-cm (10-inch) eTask with Smart Touch Technology colour touchscreen is very responsive and multi-touch capable with pinch, zoom and flick gestures, much like a tablet.

It starts with 1,200 dpi CCD-based scan quality for colour and information accuracy, then adds automatic size sensing and ultrasonic multifeed detection to ensure that every page intended for archiving or integration into your digital workflow is successfully scanned.

Minimising maintenance reduces downtime, so the CX860 features photoconductor units that last up to 175,000 pages, and replacement toner rated at up to 55,000* black and up to 55,000* colour pages.
*Average continuous black or continuous composite CMY declared cartridge yield in one-sided (simplex) mode up to this number of standard pages in accordance with ISO/IEC 19798.

description.description_text: The Lexmark CX860de colour A4 MFP combines a print speed of up to 57 pages per minute, ease of use, professional colour and configurable software solutions with available finishing options.

The Lexmark CX860de colour A4 MFP combines print speed of up to 57 pages per minute, ease of use and professional colour with configurable software solutions. Its high-performance graphics chip, standard input capacity of up to 650 pages (expandable to 4,500) and monthly duty cycle of up to 350,000 pages are enhanced by advanced staple and staple/hole punch finishing options.

The Lexmark CX860de colour A4 MFP combines 57 page-per-minute print speed, ease of use and professional colour with configurable software solutions. A 25-cm (10-inch) class e-Task colour touchscreen features an ultra-smooth surface that can be activated by almost anything, including pens, fingertips or nails –without pressure or direct skin contact. Its high-performance graphics chip, standard input capacity of up to 650 pages (expandable to 4,500) and monthly duty cycle of up to 350,000 pages are enhanced by optional finishing capabilities comparable to production A3 copiers: inline staple finisher and multi-position staple/hole punch finisher. To reduce maintenance and minimise downtime, it has long-life photoconductor units and high-yield toner cartridges – ideal for high-volume production environments.

mkt_general.mkt_paragraph: Consistently outstanding image quality. Long-life system reliability. Superior sustainability. Innovative shake-free print system.
mkt_general.tagline: Essential to Lexmark Print System Performance.

feature.feature_text: Essential to Lexmark print system performance, Unison™ Toner's unique formulation consistently delivers outstanding image quality, ensures long-life print system reliability and promotes superior sustainability -- all in an innovative shake-free print system.

Keep up-front costs low and quality high with Genuine Lexmark cartridges. Standard Yield cartridges offer a lower purchase price and contain fewer pages than High Yield cartridges do. Perfect for low volume printing.
Genuine Lexmark supplies are engineered to work Best Together with your Lexmark printer, delivering excellent print quality from the first page to the last.
Going green has never been easier. Recycle all your used Lexmark supplies by letting us take care of the details. It’s simple, smart and always free.

Lexmark Return Programme cartridges are print cartridges sold at a discount in exchange for the customer's agreement that the cartridges will be used only once and returned only to Lexmark for remanufacturing or recycling. These single-use only cartridges will stop working after reaching the end of the rated life established by Lexmark (a variable amount of toner may remain when replacement is required). These cartridges may also automatically update the printer memory to protect the printer from counterfeit and unauthorised products. Supplies without this single-use term are available at www.lexmark.com.

mkt_general.mkt_name: Lexmark CX860dte
mkt_general.mkt_paragraph: The Lexmark CX860dte colour A4 MFP combines a print speed of up to 57 pages per minute, ease of use, professional colour and standard input capacity of up to 1,750 pages, with available finishing options.
mkt_general.tagline: Full-featured A4 overachiever challenges colour A3 specs

feature.feature_text: A 1.6 GHz quad core processor with 2 GB of standard memory helps the CX860 Series handle complex jobs, whilst a print speed of up to 57 ppm allows users in high-volume print environments to get fast colour output. Even large colour print jobs complete quickly so users are more productive.
Professional colour features include ultra-sharp 4800 Colour Quality, PANTONE® calibration and spot colour replacement for repeatable colour accuracy even with critical corporate identity elements.

Lexmark-exclusive Embedded Solutions Framework (eSF) makes the MFP programmable to meet the needs of each customer and industry. And the CX860 Series’ 25-cm (10-inch) class e-Task colour touchscreen features an ultra-smooth surface that can be activated by almost anything, including pens, fingertips or nails – without pressure or direct skin contact.

It starts with standard input capacity of up to 1,750 pages (expandable to 4,500) and prints on the broadest media weight range of any A4 colour laser MFP – from tissue-thin paper to thick card stock. Add a compact inline staple finisher or multi-position staple/hole punch finisher.
The CX860’s 25-cm (10-inch) eTask with Smart Touch Technology colour touchscreen is very responsive and multi-touch capable with pinch, zoom and flick gestures, much like a tablet.

It starts with 1,200 dpi CCD-based scan quality for colour and information accuracy, then adds automatic size sensing and ultrasonic multifeed detection to ensure that every page intended for archiving or integration into your digital workflow is successfully scanned.

Minimising maintenance reduces downtime, so the CX860 features photoconductor units that last up to 175,000 pages, and replacement toner rated at up to 55,000* black and up to 55,000* colour pages.
*Average continuous black or continuous composite CMY declared cartridge yield in one-sided (simplex) mode up to this number of standard pages in accordance with ISO/IEC 19798.

description.description_text: The Lexmark CX860dte colour A4 MFP combines a print speed of up to 57 pages per minute, ease of use, professional colour and standard input capacity of up to 1,750 pages, with available finishing options.

The Lexmark CX860dte colour A4 MFP combines print a speed of up to 57 pages per minute, ease of use and professional colour with configurable software solutions. Its high-performance graphics chip, standard input capacity of up to 1,750 pages (expandable to 4,500) and monthly duty cycle of up to 350,000 pages are enhanced by advanced finishing options for both stapling and hole-punching (optional).

The Lexmark CX860dte colour A4 MFP combines a 57 page-per-minute print speed, ease of use and professional colour with configurable software solutions. A 25-cm (10-inch) class e-Task colour touchscreen features an ultra-smooth surface that can be activated by almost anything, including pens, fingertips or nails –without pressure or direct skin contact. Its high-performance graphics chip, standard input capacity of up to 1,750 pages (expandable to 4,500) and monthly duty cycle of up to 350,000 pages are enhanced by an optional staple finisher or staple / hole punch finisher comparable to production A3 copiers. To reduce maintenance and minimise downtime, it has long-life photoconductor units and high-yield toner cartridges – ideal for high-volume production environments.

mkt_general.mkt_name: Lexmark CX725dthe
mkt_general.mkt_paragraph: The Lexmark CX725dthe offers workgroup-level printing performance, advanced scanning, hard drive with OCR and enhanced functionality, plus support for up to 2,300 pages of input.
mkt_general.tagline: Workgroup-level MFP offers performance and features of more costly devices

feature.feature_text: A 1.2 GHz quad core processor with up to 4 GB of memory gives the CX725 a powerful print controller.
Professional colour features including ultra-sharp 4800 Colour Quality, PANTONE® calibration and Lexmark Colour Replacement work with Unison Toner to deliver precision matching of critical hues.
Lexmark-exclusive Cloud Solution Framework (cSF) and Embedded Solutions Framework (eSF) applications make the MFP programmable to meet the needs of each customer and industry.

Media loading and feeding are engineered for ease, reliability and versatility, with up to 1,200 pages of input capacity (expandable to 2,300), small-media and banner-length support and exceptionally durable input trays that resist misfeeds.
A bright, 17.8-cm (7-inch) colour touch screen features an ultra-smooth surface and can be activated by almost anything, including pens, fingertips or nails –without pressure or direct skin contact.
Automatic de-skew, mixed-size scanning, page-level jam recovery, integrated file compression and OCR make the CX725 a scanning power tool.

description.description_text: The Lexmark CX725dthe offers workgroup-level printing performance, advanced scanning, hard drive with OCR and enhanced functionality, plus support for up to 2,300 pages of input.

The Lexmark CX725dthe offers workgroup-level performance, advanced scanning, hard drive with OCR and enhanced functionality, plus support for up to 2,300 pages of input. A 1.2 GHz quad core processor, up to 4 GB of memory and instant warm-up fuser mean a fast first page and up to 47 pages per minute.

The Lexmark CX725dthe offers workgroup-level printing performance, advanced scanning, time-saving OCR capabilities and a hard drive for enhanced functionality in a compact, easy-to-use package that supports up to 2,300 pages of input capacity. With a 1.2 GHz quad core processor, up to 4 GB of memory and instant warm-up fuser, the CX725dthe can produce its first black page in as fast as 5.5 seconds, and first colour page in as little as 6 seconds. And the Lexmark CX725dthe supports everything you do at up to 47 pages per minute.

mkt_general.mkt_paragraph: Consistently outstanding image quality. Long-life system reliability. Superior sustainability. Innovative shake-free print system.
mkt_general.tagline: Essential to Lexmark Print System Performance.

feature.feature_text: Essential to Lexmark print system performance, Unison™ Toner's unique formulation consistently delivers outstanding image quality, ensures long-life print system reliability and promotes superior sustainability -- all in an innovative shake-free print system.

Maximise your savings and enjoy premium quality with Genuine Lexmark cartridges. High Yield cartridges offer a lower cost per page and contain more pages than Standard Yield cartridges do. Perfect for high volume printing.
Going green has never been easier. Recycle all your used Lexmark supplies by letting us take care of the details. It’s simple, smart and always free.

Lexmark Return Programme cartridges are patented print cartridges sold at a discount in exchange for the customer’s agreement to the licence requirement that the cartridges will be used only once and returned only to Lexmark for remanufacturing or recycling. These patented cartridges are licensed for single use only and will stop working after delivering a fixed amount of ink and/or toner. Ink and/or toner may remain in the cartridge when replacement is required. Replacement cartridges sold without these restrictions are also available.
Genuine Lexmark supplies are engineered to work Best Together with your Lexmark printer, delivering excellent print quality from the first page to the last.

Duty Cycle Notes
attribute.value: "Recommended Monthly Page Volume" is a range of pages that helps customers evaluate Lexmark’s product offerings based on the average number of pages customers plan to print on the device each month. Lexmark recommends that the number of pages per month be within the stated range for optimum device performance, based on factors including: supplies replacement intervals, paper loading intervals, speed, and typical customer usage.

"Maximum Monthly Duty Cycle" is defined as the maximum number of pages a device could deliver in a month using a multishift operation. This metric provides a comparison of robustness in relation to other Lexmark printers and MFPs.

mkt_general.mkt_name: Lexmark MX912de
mkt_general.mkt_paragraph: A 300,000-page maximum monthly duty cycle and output up to 65 ppm put the MX912de at the top of Lexmark’s large-format monochrome multifunction product line.
mkt_general.tagline: Large format meets top volume

feature.feature_text: Show the big picture that typical printers can’t produce, with SRA3 capability.
Meet your most demanding output requirements with up to 65 pages per minute, input capacity up to 6,650 pages and a 300,000-page maximum monthly duty cycle.
Long-life replaceable components, fast wake-up, energy-saving modes and duplex printing reduce your environmental footprint.
Connect nearly everyone with Gigabit Ethernet, USB and optional parallel ports plus optional wireless and mobile printing.
Stapling, offset stacking, hole-punching and both trifold and saddle-stitched booklets give users finishing options for many different needs.
Access on-screen solutions to customise the user experience, integrate with other devices and meet business process needs.

description.description_text: A 300,000-page maximum monthly duty cycle and output up to 65 ppm put the MX912de at the top of Lexmark’s large-format monochrome multifunction product line.

A 300,000-page maximum monthly duty cycle and output up to 65 ppm put the MX912de at the top of Lexmark’s large-format monochrome multifunction product line. It combines long-life replaceable components, solid security and advanced finishing in an SRA3-capable package with a Lexmark e-Task interface that offers a variety of customer-selectable solutions.

A 300,000-page maximum monthly duty cycle and output up to 65 ppm put the MX912de at the top of Lexmark’s large-format monochrome multifunction product line. It combines long-life replaceable components, solid security and advanced finishing in an SRA3-capable package with a Lexmark e-Task interface that offers a variety of customer-selectable solutions. Gigabit Ethernet, USB and optional parallel ports, with optional wireless connectivity and mobile printing, support maximum connectivity. And a comprehensive set of enterprise-class network security features and protocols are built in to protect your device, your information and your network.

attribute.name: Maximum Monthly Duty Cycle: Up to
Duty Cycle Notes
attribute.value: "Recommended Monthly Page Volume" is a range of pages that helps customers evaluate Lexmark’s product offerings based on the average number of pages customers plan to print on the device each month. Lexmark recommends that the number of pages per month be within the stated range for optimum device performance, based on factors including: supplies replacement intervals, paper loading intervals, speed, and typical customer usage.

"Maximum Monthly Duty Cycle" is defined as the maximum number of pages a device could deliver in a month using a multishift operation. This metric provides a comparison of robustness in relation to other Lexmark printers and MFPs.

mkt_general.mkt_name: Lexmark MB3442adw
mkt_general.mkt_paragraph: Get output of up to 40 pages per minute*, plus double-side automatic scanning, copying, faxing, touch-screen convenience and Wi-Fi, all in the compact Lexmark MB3442adw.
mkt_general.tagline: Multifunction builds on outstanding performance with standard Wi-Fi

feature.feature_text: Measuring just 339 mm high x 411 mm wide x 366 mm deep, the business-class MB3442adw fits almost anywhere. Its compact size and light weight make it easy to set up and easy to move.

Take command of printing, copying, faxing and automatic two-sided scanning with a 7.2 cm colour touch screen. It not only supports convenient interaction with essential system functions and task information, it also includes built-in cloud connectors to help you to save scans to and retrieve files from popular cloud services Box, DropBox, Google Drive, and Microsoft OneDrive.

In addition to a first page as fast as 5.9 seconds and output of up to 40 pages per minute*, optional High Yield Unison™ toner provides up to 6,000 pages** of output, whilst an optional paper tray increases total input capacity by up to 900 sheets for more printing and less downtime. And with its steel frame and lifetime fuser, the MB3442adw is built to last.

Lexmark's comprehensive approach to product security is a design and engineering mandate across our entire product portfolio. Our security features help to keep your information safe - in the document, on the device, over the network and at all points in between.

In addition to Ethernet and USB, built-in Wi-Fi makes it easy for mobile users to get output via the Lexmark Mobile Print app, as well as Mopria®, AirPrint and Google Cloud Print. And the Lexmark Mobile Assistant app simplifies wireless configuration.

Automatic two-sided printing is standard, along with built-in energy-saving modes that help to support ratings of EPEAT® Silver and ENERGY STAR® certified. The Lexmark Cartridge Collection Programme (LCCP) and Lexmark Equipment Collection Programme (LECP) minimise waste and support recycling (availability varies by country).
For added peace of mind, this product includes a 4-year guarantee upon registration.
* Print and copy speeds measured in accordance with ISO/IEC 24734 and ISO/IEC 24735 respectively (ESAT). For more information see: www.lexmark.com/ISOspeeds.

** Average continuous mono declared yield in one-sided (simplex) mode of up to this number of pages in accordance with ISO/IEC 19752. Actual yield will vary considerably based upon many factors. See www.lexmark.com/yields for more information.

description.description_text: Get output of up to 40 pages per minute*, plus double-side automatic scanning, copying, faxing, touch-screen convenience and Wi-Fi, all in the compact Lexmark MB3442adw.

Light, compact and fast, the MB3442adw multifunction supports output of up to 40 pages per minute*, plus double-side automatic scanning, copying, faxing and touch-screen convenience. Connect via USB, Ethernet or Wi-Fi and add an optional 550-sheet paper tray or Extra High Yield Unison™ toner, offering up to 6,000 pages** for longer print runs.

Built with the essential features that small workgroups need, the MB3442adw multifunction supports output of up to 40 pages per minute*, plus double-side automatic scanning, copying and faxing. Light and compact, it fits almost anywhere and lets you connect via USB, Ethernet and Wi-Fi to give both network and mobile users access. The 7.2 cm colour touch screen includes built-in cloud connectivity to enhance workflow. Standard two-sided printing saves paper, whilst Lexmark full-spectrum security helps to protect your network and proprietary information. Add an optional 550-sheet paper tray or Extra High Yield Unison™ toner, offering up to 6,000 pages** for longer print runs.

mkt_general.mkt_paragraph: Lexmark's best service offering! You get fast onsite service by next business day

feature.feature_text: Following the extended-warranty period, renewal coverage may be purchased for one year at a time as long as the product is supported by Lexmark.

With Lexmark Onsite Service coverage, if your technical issue cannot be resolved over the phone, a Lexmark Technical Support representative will dispatch a qualified Lexmark service technician to your location for next-business-day service. The technician will service your defective device onsite and will make sure it meets Lexmark’s most stringent standards of quality and performance. This offering includes telephone and Web-based support, all parts and labour, and onsite service and testing.

description.description_text: Lexmark's best service offering! You get fast onsite service by next business day
